description: The Republic's health minister said his department was "preparing options" to present to government.
title: Coronavirus: Non-essential travel could be restricted in Ireland
title_page: Coronavirus: Non-essential travel could be restricted in Ireland - BBC News
maintext: Many are asking about travel/tourists coming into Ireland from countries with high Covid rates. My Dept is preparing options for Gov on how to restrict non-essential travel from third countries (outside EU/UK) with high rates of Covid. Am concerned about high rates in some places
